mapper.select: SELECT id, chapter_number, created_at AS createDate, content, title FROM `chapters` WHERE id = #{id};

SELECT B.id, B.book_name AS bookName, B.author, B.book_icon AS bookIcon, B.tag, Ch.chapter_number, Ch.created_at AS createDate, Ch.content, Ch.title FROM chapters Ch LEFT JOIN book B ON B.id = Ch.id WHERE Ch.id = #{id} AND Ch.chapter_number = #{chapterNumber} LIMIT 1
